\n \n 2015\n New England Patriots\n \n Rosters, Stats, Schedule, Team Draftees, Injury Reports\n

\n
\n \n Previous Season\n \n \n Next Season\n \n
\n \n\n

\n Record: 12-4-0, 1st in\n\tAFC East Division\n  (Schedule and Results)\n

\n\n\n\n\n

Coach: \n Bill Belichick (12-4-0)

\n\n\n

Points For: 465 (29.1/g) 3rd of 32

\n

Points Against: 315 (19.7/g) 10th of 32

\n

Expected W-L: 11.5-4.5

\n

SRS: 6.97 (7th of 32), \n SOS: -2.41\n

\n\n\n

Playoffs:
Won Divisional Round 27-20 vs. Kansas City Chiefs
Lost Conference Championship 18-20 vs. Denver Broncos

\n\n\n\t\n\t

Offensive Coordinator: Josh McDaniels

\n\t\n\t\n\t

Defensive Coordinator: Matt Patricia

\n\t\n\n\n\t

Other Notable Asst.: Josh Boyer (Cornerbacks), Nick Caley (Offensive Assistant), Brian Daboll (Tight Ends), Brian Flores (Safeties), Patrick Graham (Linebackers), Joe Judge (Special Teams Coordinator) and Chad O'Shea (Wide Receivers)\n\n\n

Stadium: Gillette Stadium

\n\n\n\t\n\t

Head Coach/de facto General Manager: Bill Belichick

\n\t\n\t

Chairman/CEO: Robert Kraft

\n\t\n\n\n\n\t\n\t\n\t

Offensive Scheme: Erhardt-Perkins

\n\t\n\t\n\t

Defensive Alignment: 4-3

\n\t\n\t\n\n\n\t

Preseason Odds: Super Bowl +800; O/U: 10.5

\n\n\n\t

Training Camp: Gillette Stadium (Foxborough, Massachusetts)

\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n
